title: Richard Finch (boxer)
text: Richard Finch (born 29 August 1962) is an Australian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201984%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20middleweight">men's light middleweight</a> event at the <a href="1984%20Summer%20Olympics">1984 Summer Olympics</a>.
